gurmukhi: ਜਿਤੇ ਸਤ੍ਰੁ ਅਾੲੇ || ਤਿਤੇ ਰਾਮ ਘਾੲੇ || ਚਲੇ ਭਾਜ ਸਰਬੰ || ਭਯੋ ਦੂਰ ਗਰਬੰ ||੨੬||
transliteration: Jite Satru Aae|| Tite Raam Ghaae|| Chale Bhaaj Saraban|| Bhayo Door Gadaban||26||
translation: All the enemies who came in front of him, Parashurama killed them all. Ultimately all of them ran away and their pride was shattered.26.

gurmukhi: ਮਹਾਂ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਧਾਰੇ ਚਲਯੋ ਅਾਪ ਭੂਪੰ || ਲੲੇ ਸਰਬ ਸੈਨਾ ਕੀੲੇ ਅਾਪ ਰੂਪੰ ||
transliteration: Mahaan Sastra Dhdare Chadyo Aap Bhoopan|| Lae Sarab Sainaa Keee Aap Roopan||
translation: Wearing his important weapons, the king himself, taking the mighty warriors with him, marched forward to wage the war.

gurmukhi: ਅਨੰਤ ਅਸਤ੍ਰ ਛੋਰੇ ਭਯੋ ਜੁੱਧੁ ਮਾਨੰ || ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਕਾਲ ਮਾਨੋ ਸਭੈ ਰਸਮ ਭਾਨੰ ||੨੭||
transliteration: Anant Astra Chore Bhayo Juddh(u) Maanan|| Prabhaa Kaal Maano Sabhai Rasam Bhaanan||
translation: Forsaking his innumerable weapons, he waged a terrible war. The king himself seemed like the rising sun at dawn.27.

gurmukhi: ਭੁਜਾ ਠੋਕ ਭੂਪੰ ਕੀਯੋ ਜੁੱਧੁ ਅੈਸੇ || ਮਨੋ ਬੀਰ ਬ੍ਰਿਤਰਾਸੁਰੇ ੲਿੰਦ੍ਰ ਜੈਸੇ ||
transliteration: Bhujaa Thok Bhoopan Keeyo Juddh(u) Aise|| Mano Beer Britraasure Indra Jaise||
translation: Patting his arms, the king firmly waged the war, like the war waged by Vrittasura with Indra;

gurmukhi: ਸਭੈ ਕਾਟ ਰਾਮੰ ਕੀਯੋ ਬਾਂਹਿ ਹੀਨੰ || ਹਤੀ ਸਰਬ ਸੈਨਾ ਭਯੋ ਗਰਬ ਛੀਨੰ ||੨੮||
transliteration: Sabhai Kaat Raamannd Keeyo Baanh(i) Heenan|| Hatisarab Sainaa Bhayo Gadab Chheenan||28||
translation: Parashurama made him armless by chopping away all his arms, and shattered his pride by destroying all his army.28.

gurmukhi: ਗਹਯੋ ਰਾਮ ਪਾਣੰ ਕੁਠਾਰੰ ਕਰਾਲੰ || ਕਟੀ ਸੁੰਡ ਸੀ ਰਾਜ ਬਾਹੰ ਬਿਸਾਲੰ ||
transliteration: Gadyo Raam Paanan Kouthaaran Karaalan|| Katn Sound Siraaj Baahan Bidaalan||
translation: Parashurama held up his dreadful axe in his hand and chopped the arm of king like the trunk of the elephant.

gurmukhi: ਭੲੇ ਅੰਗ ਭੰਗੰ ਕਰੰ ਕਾਲ ਹੀਣੰ || ਗਯੋ ਗਰਬ ਸਰਬੰ ਭੲੀ ਸੈਣ ਛੀਣੰ ||੨੯||
transliteration: Bhae An Bhanadg Karan Kaal Heenan|| Gado Gadab Saraban Bhaisain Chheenan||29||
translation: In this way becoming limbless, the whole army of the king was destroyed and his ego was shattered.29.

gurmukhi: ਰਹਯੋ ਅੰਤ ਖੇਤੰ ਅਚੇਤੰ ਨਰੇਸੰ || ਬਚੇ ਬੀਰ ਜੇਤੇ ਗੲੇ ਭਾਜ ਦੇਸੰ ||
transliteration: Rahyo Ant Khetan Achetan Daresan|| Bache Beer Geje Gad Bhaaj Desan||
translation: Ultimatley, becoming unconscious the king fell down in the battlefield, and all his warriors, who remained alive, fled away to their own countries.

gurmukhi: ਲੲੀ ਛੀਨ ਛੳੁਨੀ ਕਰੇ ਛੱਤ੍ਰ ਘਾਤੰ || ਚਿਰੰਕਾਲ ਪੂਜਾ ਕਰੀ ਲੋਗ ਮਾਤੰ ||੩੦||
transliteration: Laichheen Chhaounidare Chhattra Ghaatan|| Chirankaal Poojaa Karilog Maatan||30||
translation: Parashurama seized his capital and destroyed the Kshatriyas and for a long time, the people worshipped him.30.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਤਿ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਨਾਟਕੇ ਰਾਜਾ ਸਹੰਸ੍ਰਬਾਹ ਬਧਹਿ ਸਮਾਪਤਮ ਸਤੁ ||
transliteration: It(i) Sribachitra Naatake Raajaa Sahansrabaah Badhah(i) Samaaptam Sat(u)||
translation: End of the description of the Killing of the King SAHASRABAHU in BACHITTAR NATAK.
